articles.title: Sympathy to President of Ghana
articles.content:
Sympathy to President of Ghana
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of sympathy to  John Dramani Mahama, president of the Republic of Ghana,  in connection with recent fire and floods that hit Accra, claiming huge human losses. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences for the president, government and people of Ghana and the bereaved families.
					
					 It wished the president, government and people of Ghana success in their efforts to eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as early as possible.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement Sunday said that Park Geun Hye of south Korea had better stop making ill outpourings and take care of the domestic affairs on the brink of ruin.
					 Park termed the DPRK's nuclear and long-range rocket development and the test of SLBM "threats" and urged it to "dismantle its nuclear program" when addressing a ceremony Saturday.
					
					 Branding this as another intolerable grave provocation against the DPRK, the spokesman goes on:
					
					 The denial of the DPRK's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and its step for bolstering up capabilities for self-defence is precisely the denial of the social system in the DPRK and an insult to its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 By speaking ill of them, Park fully revealed again her design to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last and realize the ambition for "unification through absorption" with the support from the U.S.
					
					 If Park is truly interested in "peaceful unification" and "dialogue" as much touted by her recently, she should have said she admits and would implement the north-south joint declarations on which the authorities of the north and the south agreed.
					
					 The joint declarations clarify the most reasonable orientation and aboveboard way of ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and achieving national reconciliation, unity, co-prosperity and reunification. 
					
					 No matter how loudly Park may trumpet about "dialogue" and "peaceful unification" while denying the joint declarations and standing in the way of their implementation, no one will lend an ear to them.
					
					 The Park group can never evade the responsibility for bedeviling the north-south relations and pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst catastrophe.

articles.title: KCU Founding Anniversary Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
KCU Founding Anniversary Celebrated in DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The 69th founding anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) was significantly celebrated by the youngsters growing to be pillars of the Songun revolution. 
					 Members of the KCU across the country visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their residential areas to lay floral baskets and bouquets and pay tribute to them. 
					
					 Joint meetings of the KCU organizations took place in Pyongyang and all provinces of the country. 
					
					 Performances were given by schoolchildren in South Hamgyong, North Hwanghae, Jagang and other provinces. 
					
					 Colorful sports and amusement games took place at schools including Changdok School, Ryusong Junior Secondary School in Central District and other schools. 
					
					 Leading officials of the party and power organs congratulated the KCU members on the anniversary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Dissolution of U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance for Aggression
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Dissolution of U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance for Aggression
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the session of NATO Parliamentary Assembly in a recent interview said that NATO opens its door to all countries hoping entry to it including Ukraine. He also said such honeyed words that NATO's expansion will help make the areas under its control more stable and safer.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries an article in this regard which says:
					
					 The expansion of NATO is a threat to the security of other countries and a grave challenge to the establishment of fair international order.
					
					 The U.S. sees the formation of NATO of Asian version as the most ideal way of realizing its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The moves are being pushed forward with the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK as a background.
					
					 Now the U.S. is more loudly grumbling about "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK's than ever before.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in taking issue with the DPRK's war deterrent is to knock into shape a military bloc of NATO type, contain big powers in the Asia-Pacific region through a military edge and thus realize its ambition to dominate the region.
					
					 It is calculating it can easily establish the NATO of Asian version through the expansion of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea military alliance.
					
					 It is clear to everyone that the U.S. moves to form the new military bloc in the Asia-Pacific region would further escalate the tension and make the Cold War-structure formed on the Korean peninsula spread to the other areas in the region.
					
					 The military bloc for aggression must be dissolved without delay, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Are to Blame for Disturbing Dialogue: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Are to Blame for Disturbing Dialogue: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive pulled up the DPRK, saying it makes "far-fetched assertion" and the like. She said "the DPRK has to respond to the dialogue without any condition". She went the lengths of making impudent remark that "south Korea has consistently proposed dialogue without any condition".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary expresses indignation at the puppet group's act of going desperate to make profound confusing of right and wrong and evade the responsibility for stymieing dialogue.
					
					 The foundation of dialogue and improvement of relations between the north and the south was ruthlessly destroyed as the puppet group has desperately staged the worldwide anti-DPRK provocation burlesques and the joint military drills against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Park Geun Hye group is trumpeting about "dialogue" while misleading public opinion. This is just a cynical ploy to shirk off the criminal responsibility for bedeviling the inter-Korean relations through the heinous political and military provocation against compatriots in the north.
					
					 No one will lend an ear to the "dialogue" trumpeted about by confrontational maniacs who always dream of doing harm to compatriots, far from getting concerned about the destiny of the inter-Korean relations. Such shameless rhetoric will never help them get rid of the responsibility for torpedoing dialogue.
					
					 The puppet group should opt to take practical action to create an atmosphere of dialogue, not just paying lip-service to the deceptive rhetoric of "dialogue".

articles.title: Severe Drought Persists in S. Korea
articles.content:
Severe Drought Persists in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A severe drought persists in south Korea, according to south Korean KBS and MBC.
					 This year's precipitation in Seoul, Kyonggi Province and south Korean Kangwon Province is under 60 percent below normal.
					
					 The water amount of the reservoirs is less than that last year when the drought was severe.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in UK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in UK 
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet website President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Fight on Staunchly for the Liberation of the Fatherland" on May 28. 
					 The work, published on June 4, Juche 26 (1937), discloses the Japanese imperialists' fascist crackdown and plunder and indicates tasks for achieving the liberation of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a releasing ceremony of Vol. 3 of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Brazil on May 28. 
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos dealing with revolutionary activities of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The events were attended by officials of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Brazil-Korea Friendship Association and other political parties and organizations and other people and the president of the Women's International Democratic Federation. The DPRK ambassador to Brazil, and staff members of his embassy were present on invitation. 
					
					 The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil referred to the significance of the book-releasing ceremony. 
					
					 He mentioned undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and advantages and invincibility of the Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 The president of the Women's International Democratic Federation said Kim Il Sung was the prominent leader who embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years and devoted his all to the liberation of Korea, its prosperity and happiness of its people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Cotonou on May 29.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the revolutionary career and undying exploits of the President and arrange political and cultural events including seminar and film show on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Abuja on June 2.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits and career of President Kim Il Sung and successes being made by the Korean people in their efforts for defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and hold political and cultural events including remembrance meeting and film show on the occasion of the 21st death anniversary of the President.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, lectures and film shows took place in Uruguay, Ethiopia and Guinea from May 28 to June 2 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Our Country Emerging Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 The international secretary of the Uruguayan March 26 Movement lauded Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party-building leadership feats, the invincible might of the WPK and advantages of the Korean socialist system.
					
					 Ethiopian personages praised Kim Jong Il as a great statesman recognized by the world, adding his party-building leadership exploits will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Uruguayan Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Uruguayan Personage
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Il will always live along with the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea headed by Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					 Ruben Maria Vera, chairman of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, said this in a statement on May 28.
					
					 The statement noted that the Korean people hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. It went on:
					
					 His idea and line have become the eternal guidelines of the WPK.
					
					 Starting his work at the Central Committee of the WPK, he put great efforts into developing in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, as required by the times and developing revolution.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician.
					
					 Thanks to him, the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung was formulated into an integral system of the idea, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 Noteworthy in his ideological and theoretical activities is the development of the Songun (army-first) idea.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Spain
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Spain
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was inaugurated in Madrid on June 1.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the remarkable successes being made by the Korean people under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize political and cultural events on the anniversaries.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on May 31 in protest against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 At a three-way consultation with Japan and south Korea, the U.S. attempted to mislead public opinion by giving impression that they wanted dialogue but the DPRK declined it.
					
					 This is just a profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 It is a fact well known to the world that the DPRK has long insisted on the resumption of dialogue without precondition.
					
					 The U.S., though belatedly, should be aware of the fact that the decade-long hostile relations between it and the DPRK are ascribable to its fundamentally wrong viewpoint on the latter and complete ignorance of it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio presentes al hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang.
					El hizo construirlos al maximo nivel a la orilla del pintoresco rio Taedong como cuna de felicidad de los ninos. Al primer dia del ano en curso, visito el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang, ocasion en la cual bendijo el provenir de los matriculados y les ofrecio gran afeccion. 
					
					Presto profunda atencion a la vida de los ninos e hizo enviar de estacion a estacion frutas y alimentos nutritivos de diferentes clases y volvio a enviar esta vez los equipos necesarios a la gestion, articulos de uso cultural y alimentos.
					
					Tuvo lugar la vispera el acto de entrega de los regalos del Mariscal.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a banda titere surcoreana enfrascada en provocar guerra de agresion a RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a banda titere surcoreana enfrascada en provocar guerra de agresion a RPDC 
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 6 la informacion no.1095 condenando a los gangsteres militares titeres del Sur de Corea que en estos dias arman con frenesi alborotos de provocacion militar y de guerra de agresion al Norte (de Corea).
					Choe Yun Hui, presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano, aparecio el dia 4 en el islote Yonphyong, donde hablo tanto de "provocacion inesperada" de alguien, de "castigo implacable" y de "golpe no solo al foco de provocacion sino tambien a las fuerzas de mando y apoyo", senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Solo durante el mes en curso, los compinches titeres desarrollaron en aguas de la isla Jeju el entrenamiento de operacion combinada anti-submarino junto con su amo norteamericano y dio abiertamente a la publicidad los "4 principios de operacion" cuya meta es el ataque de sorpresa nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, organizaron la division combinada con las tropas agresoras yanquis, efectuaron bajo la presencia de Park Geun-hye el lanzamiento de prueba de misil nuevamente desarrollado y fomentan psicosis de guerra de agresion al Norte hablando de capacidad de golpear toda la extension del Norte. 
					
					Tal imprudencia no pasa de ser el espasmo histerico de quienes atemorizados ante el poderio militar de la RPDC cada vez mas fuerte y el sintoma final de los psicopatas.
					
					Debido a las belicosas palabras conflictivas e imprudentes maniobras belicas de la horda de Park, connotada maniaca de guerra y sirviente al imperio yanqui, las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas se tornan cada dia mas peores y la Peninsula Coreana se acerca mas y mas a la crisis de guerra nuclear.
					
					Cuanto mas la camarilla titere recurre con frenesi a la provocacion de guerra de agresion al Norte, tanto mas se acelerara el tiempo de su fin vergonzoso.
					
					La banda titere del Sur de Corea debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de la leccion amarga del incidente del islote Yonphyong.
